attributes.additional_details: My 5 year old grandson was mauled by 2 of these dogs and was very lucky to be alive, there has been numerous attacks from these dogs who do not just bite these dogs want to kill and they are so powerful and uncontrollable. Nearly every attack is unprovoked and nearly every attack results in death from these dogs
attributes.background: I want all types of XL bully dog breed banned

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

'Add 'American Bully' dogs to the list of banned dog breeds'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618243
